#include<iostream>
#include<cstring>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;

    while(t--)
    {
        string code;
        cin>>code;

        int len = code.length();
        cout<<code[len/2 - 1];

        for(int i=len/2 - 2; i>=0; i--)
            cout<<code[i];
        for(int i=len-1; i>len/2 - 1; i--)
            cout<<code[i];

        cout<<endl;

    }
}
